image:image.image:title: Mystery at Whimsy Manor
image:image.image:caption: A mysterious manor under the moonlight surrounded by two trees and mountains behind.

image:image.image:title: Magical Pumpkin
image:image.image:caption: A magical pumpkin is smiling, wearing a tall, curved hat. Two round lollipops are attached to the hat with a ribbon.

image:image.image:title: Luna, the Dancing Witch
image:image.image:caption: Luna, a young witch, dances with a bright green light shining from her right hand. She wears a pink skirt, a purple shirt with a cat on a crescent moon, and has pink hair with orange streaks.

image:image.image:title: Luna’s Facial Expressions
image:image.image:caption: Three expressions of Luna: smiling shyly with raised shoulders, looking doubtful with one eyebrow arched, and angry with an open mouth and furrowed brows.

image:image.image:title: 90s Teenage Witch’s Bedroom
image:image.image:caption: A two-level bedroom with a bed on a mezzanine, surrounded by books and plants. Below, a desk holds potions, a camera, and candles. Personal items and cozy details fill the magical space.

image:image.image:title: Exploring the Cliffs
image:image.image:caption: A young woman smiles while looking toward the Cliffs of Moher. White flowers float in the wind, and a tall rock rises from the sea, creating a soft and magical scene.
